title: AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, 4000A Peak 27800mAh Battery Jump Starter (for All Gas or Up to 10L Diesel), Battery Booster Power Pack, 12V Auto Jump Box with LED Light, USB Quick Charge 3.0, 4000A peak current, includes 88Wh portable battery charger
descriptions:
Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, a powerful and reliable device designed to jump start your vehicle in emergency situations. With its impressive peak current of 4000 and battery capacity of 27800mAh, this jump starter is capable of starting both gasoline and diesel engines up to 10L.

Equipped with a 12V Auto Jump Box battery booster, the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter features a range of useful and convenient features. The built-in LED light provides illumination in dark environments, while the USB quick charge 3.0 technology allows for fast charging of your devices. The type C input and output ports offer compatibility with a wide range of devices.

Safety is a top priority with the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter. The intelligent protection systems include safeguards against short circuits, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connection. This ensures the longevity and safety of both the jump starter and your vehicle.

The AVAPOW Car Jump Starter is highly portable, making it ideal for use on the go. It comes with a variety of accessories including portable battery starter, jumper cables, USB-C cable, cigarette lighter converter, carry case, and a user manual. Additionally, our 24-hour online after-sales team provides excellent customer support to address any concerns or queries you may have.

With its rugged design and metal clamps, the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter is built to withstand tough conditions. It is suitable for use with 12V cars, motorcycles, ATV, UTV, lawn mowers, and snowmobiles. On a full charge, it can start your vehicle up to 40 times.

Experience the convenience and reliability of the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter. Say goodbye to the frustration of being stranded with a dead battery and get back on the road quickly and effortlessly. Order yours today and enjoy the peace of mind that comes with having a dependable jump starter at your disposal. Please note that an adapter is not included.

Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, the ultimate solution for all your vehicle jump-starting needs. With its powerful features and reliable performance, this jump starter is a must-have for any car owner.

Featuring a peak current of 4000 and a battery capacity of 27800mAh (88Wh), this jump starter is capable of jump-starting gasoline engines of all sizes and diesel engines up to 10L. No matter the vehicle, the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter has you covered.

Equipped with a 12V Auto Jump Box battery booster type, this jump starter is designed to provide a quick and efficient jump-starting experience. It also comes with a range of convenient features, including an LED light for enhanced visibility, USB quick charge 3.0 for fast charging of your devices, and a type-C input/output for versatile connectivity options.

Safety is of utmost importance, which is why the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter is equipped with an intelligent protection system. This system safeguards against short circuits, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connection, ensuring a worry-free jump-starting experience.

With its portable design, you can easily take the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter anywhere you go. It comes with a variety of accessories, including jumper cables, a USB-C cable, a cigarette lighter converter, a carry case, and a user manual. Everything you need is included in the package.

Rest assured that you will receive excellent after-sales support with our 24-hour online after-sales team. We are here to assist you with any questions or concerns you may have.

Don't miss out on the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, the reliable and powerful solution for all your jump-starting needs. Get yours today and experience peace of mind on the road. (Adapter not included)

Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter! This powerful and versatile device is a must-have for every vehicle owner. With its exceptional features and reliable performance, you can always count on it to get you out of a sticky situation.

Key Features:
- Peak Current: 4000
- Battery Capacity: 27800mAh/88Wh
- Engine Compatibility: Suitable for gasoline engines of all sizes and diesel engines up to 10L
- Battery Booster Type: 12V Auto Jump Box
- LED Light: Equipped with a bright LED light for enhanced visibility in dark environments
- USB Quick Charge 3.0: Charge your devices at lightning-fast speeds
- Type-C Input/Output: Enjoy the convenience of using Type-C devices and charging capabilities
- Intelligent Protection Systems: Stay worry-free with built-in protection against short circuits, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connection
- Portable: Take it anywhere you go for peace of mind on the road

Charging Ports:
- USB 1: Voltage - 5V, Current - 3A, 2A, 1.5A
- USB 2: Voltage - 5V, Current - 2.4A

LED Modes:
- Flashlight
- SOS
- Strobe

Package Contents:
- Portable Battery Starter
- Jumper Cables
- USB-C Cable
- Cigarette Lighter Converter
- Carry Case
- User Manual

After-Sales Support:
- Our 24-hour online after-sales team is ready to assist you with any queries or concerns you may have

Please note that the adapter is not included with the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter.
